alert.note: Alert for Berrien (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 3:29PM EST until further notice by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Ohio...Michigan... Little River above Huntington affecting Wabash, Allen IN and Huntington Counties. Salamonie River below Warren affecting Wabash, Huntington, Blackford, Wells and Jay Counties. Salamonie River at Portland affecting Jay County. Tippecanoe River above Winamac affecting Pulaski, White and Carroll Counties. Tippecanoe River near Ora affecting Pulaski, Marshall, Fulton IN, Starke and Kosciusko Counties. Wabash River near Linn Grove affecting Adams and Wells Counties. Wabash River near Bluffton IN affecting Wells County. Wabash River at Wabash affecting Cass IN, Miami and Wabash Counties. Eel River at North Manchester affecting Cass IN, Miami, Wabash, Whitley and Kosciusko Counties. Kankakee River at Davis affecting Starke, La Porte and St. Joseph IN Counties. Yellow River at Plymouth affecting Marshall, Starke and St. Joseph IN Counties. Auglaize River near Fort Jennings affecting Allen OH, Paulding and Putnam Counties. Ottawa River near Kalida affecting Putnam County. Auglaize River near Defiance affecting Defiance County. Blanchard River at Ottawa affecting Putnam County. Maumee River at Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN and Paulding Counties. Maumee River at Napoleon affecting Henry County. Maumee River near Defiance affecting Henry and Defiance Counties. Saint Joseph River Ohio near St. Joe River Ft. Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Saint Joseph River Ohio near Newville affecting Allen IN, De Kalb and Defiance Counties. Saint Marys River near Decatur affecting Allen IN, Van Wert and Adams Counties. Saint Marys River at St. Mary`s River near Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Fulton OH, Williams and Defiance Counties. North Branch Elkhart River at Cosperville affecting Noble County. Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Elkhart River at Goshen affecting Noble and Elkhart Counties. Saint Joseph River Michigan at Niles affecting Elkhart, Berrien and St. Joseph IN Counties. Spy Run Creek at Spy Run Creek near Park Drive At Fort Wayne affecting Allen IN County. .These river rises will shift ice within the river and could lead to ice jams. This forecast is based on unobstructed flow and does not factor additional rises associated with ice jams. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Joseph River Michigan at South Bend. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Flooding is confined to mostly park land and golf courses. Leeper Park and Petro golf courses begin to flood. At 7.0 feet, Flooding is confined to park land and park roads. Some backyard flooding may occur in low lying residential areas near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 AM EST Thursday the stage was 4.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to a crest of 6.5 feet early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 5.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
